app_description: Pocketalk App brings industry leading translation solutions to mobile devices for a connection anywhere you go. Honed through over half a billion translations you ll have access to the most reliable and trusted conversational translations whenever you have your phone so always . Pocketalk app hand selects the best translation engines for each language pairing ensuring fast accurate and accessible translations that bridge the language divide. It stands in a class of its own you won t find another app that can translate with the same speed level of accuracy or in as many languages. Why Pocketalk Pocketalk App creates a world of new possibilities for casual spontaneous and on the go conversations. The cloud based app solution is the perfect companion to the handheld device where the device is better for more formal settings with HIPAA and GDPR compliance the app is found at your fingertips for those times conversation just happens. Ideal translation solution in casual settings like over coffee with an international colleague or during an interview with an international reporter. Never miss a conversation again with your grandparents that only speak their native language. Using the app will support building connections that may have been missed relying on other family members to translate conversations. Informal exchanges with your international colleagues that you re meeting for the first time in person or hundredth time for happy hour. Spark up a genuine conversation with your neighbor from Mexico grocer from Greece and beyond. Features Voice Translations: 74 languages: Speech to speech and text translations 11 languages: Speech to text translations Camera Translations: 56 languages: Take a picture and have the text translate with Pocketalk s language autorecognition technology. To find out more visit: Global: https: pocketalk.com UK: https: uk.pocketalk.com Europe: https: europe.pocketalk.com Japan: https: pocketalk.jp Supported Languages: Afrikaans Albanian Amharic Arabic Azerbaijani Basque Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Cantonese Catalan Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Australia English India English Philippines English UK English USA Estonian Farsi Filipino Finnish French Canada French France Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Hebrew Hindi Hungarian Icelandic Indonesian Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Khmer Korean Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malay Malayalam Marathi Mongolian Myanmar Nepali Norwegian Polish Portuguese Brazil Portuguese Portugal Punjab Rao Romanian Russian Serbian Sinhalese Slovak Slovenian Spanish Argentina Spanish Colombia Spanish Spain Spanish USA Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Zulu Somali Dari Price and duration of paid functions: 0.99 per week tax included 2.49 per month tax included 26.49 per year tax included Prices are subject to change. The term will be automatically renewed every week month or year starting from the date of application. Billing: Charged to your iTunes account. Automatic renewal will be made on a monthly basis. Auto Renewal Details: Unless you turn off your auto renewal at least 24 hours before the end of current paid subscription period your membership will be automatically renewed. The billing for the auto renewal will be done within 24 hours after the end of the membership period. How to check and cancel subscription: You can check your subscription status and cancel with the following steps. 1. Open the Settings app on your iPhone or iPad. 2. Tap your name at the top of the page. 3. Under your profile select Subscriptions 4. Tap the subscription you wish to manage. 5. Tap the button that says Cancel Subscription
